feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Rip Current Statement issued March 03 at 3:57PM EST until March 07 at 7:00AM EST by NWS
entry.summary: ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Dangerous rip currents. * WHERE...Coastal Broward, Coastal Palm Beach and Coastal Miami- Dade Counties. * WHEN...Through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away
entry.cap:areaDesc: Coastal Broward County; Coastal Miami Dade County; Coastal Palm Beach County

entry.title: Air Quality Alert issued March 03 at 12:17PM EST by NWS
entry.summary: ...AIR POLLUTION ADVISORY TODAY INTO FRIDAY... The Environmental Protection Commission of Hillsborough County has issued an Air Pollution Advisory. for more information please contact... The Environmental Protection Commission of Hillsborough County http://www.epchc.org.

entry.title: Wind Advisory issued March 03 at 3:28PM HST until March 04 at 6:00AM HST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WIND ADVISORY FOR BIG ISLAND SUMMITS... .An upper level trough passing over the islands will maintain very strong summit winds this evening. Winds will decline late tonight and Friday. ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST FRIDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 45 mph, strongest this evening.

entry.title: High Surf Advisory issued March 03 at 3:26PM HST until March 05 at 6:00AM HST by NWS
entry.summary: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU AND MOLOKAI AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves rising to 12 to 16 feet along north and west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai and north facing shores of Oahu, Molokai and Maui. entry.title: Flood Advisory issued March 03 at 11:08AM MST by NWS
entry.summary: .Rain and melting snow today will contribute to rises on creeks and streams in north Idaho. Rock slides, minor field flooding, and mudslides in steep terrain may also be possible. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and snowmelt continues. * WHERE...A portion of North Idaho, including the following

entry.title: Hydrologic Outlook issued March 02 at 12:21PM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Continued ponding water in low lying areas and on roadways through Thursday... Area covered - Clearwater County, Idaho Timing of the event - Through Thursday evening An additional half inch of precipitation is expected in the valleys with one to two inches in the terrain over the next 36 hours,

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued March 03 at 3:19PM PST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Winter Weather Returns After Stretch Of Warmth...
